content: **crocheted beret and neck warmer in drops lima crocheted with spiral pattern in treble crochets ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the green gables neck warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-109 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- * **for the entire set ** **size** s/m m/l **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-250 g colour 9018 sea green **crochet gauge ** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook * **hat** **size** size s/m m/l head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 9018 sea green 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/204-26-b-green-gables-neck-warmer
